section.content: It's the holiday season once again.  I know all of you Lupin fans have been good boys and girls this year, so let's see what Santa is bringing us this month.

section.title: Lupin returns to Adult Swim
section.content: Lupin fans must have been very good this year as Santa has granted their wish. Lupin is returning to Adult Swim starting 5 January 2004. It takes over the 1:30AM slot. Group member "spankdown" noticed this great news on the ToonZone message boards. No new episodes are slated for broadcast at this time. Let's hope that this is not Lupin's last hurrah on broadcast television.

section.title: TokyoPop has series two manga?
section.content:
Group member "xanbiexar" noticed something very interesting in the most recent volume ten. The "Also available" listed Lupin III series 2; there is no mention of this on the TokyoPop website, and no official announcement has been made.

Let's all keep our fingers crossed and hope this is not an error. If TokyoPop does release series two in the US, can the most recent Japanese manga releases be far behind?

section.title: And in other manga news...
section.content: Giovanni Di Chiara passed along an interesting piece of information. A member of the Lupin III European Page forums posted their that the Italian Lupin III Millenium manga is going to be released in the US and France. It will be interesting to see which US publisher has picked this unique title up.

section.title: More toys are on the way from Diamond Comics
section.content: Kerry Lee spotted more Lupin toys in the recent Diamond Comics preview. Diamond will be releasing US versions of the green jacket Lupin, black catsuit Fujiko, and Jigen Medicom figures. They are scheduled for release in May 2004 and will retail for $29.99 each. Will they equal the quality of their Japanese counterparts? Only time will tell.

section.title: Lupin fans are creative
section.content: Our little group has been growing nicely. Some of our members have been working hard to give back to the community. So, check out this nice selection of fan-fiction and other items.

Daddy's Girl by Bekka Mouri Hibiki
The Picture, the Promise, and the Protectors by J. Lucy-Daisuke
Dragons and Phoenixes, Fathers and Daughters by J. Lucy-Daisuke
Sim Lupin - Lupin skins for The Sims

section.title: Upcoming & Recent Releases
section.content:
4 November:
Lupin III Volume 9 (manga, TokyoPop)
9 December:
Lupin III Volume 10 (manga, TokyoPop)
6 January 2004:
Lupin III Volume 11 (manga, TokyoPop)
14 January 2004:
Lupin the 3rd TV 5: Mission: Irresistible (R1 DVD, Geneon)
2 March 2004:
Lupin III Volume 12 (manga, TokyoPop)
4 May 2004:
Lupin III Volume 13 (manga, TokyoPop)
Unknown Release Date:
Lupin the 3rd & Mamo 12-inch Action Figure Set (Diamond Comics)
Lupin the 3rd (US PS2, Bandai/Dreamworks)

section.title: Parting Shots
section.content:
Looks like 2004 is shaping up to be another great year for Lupin fans -- Lupin back on Adult Swim, toys from Diamond Comics, the eventual release of the PS2 game, TokyoPop possibly releasing the second manga series, another Lupin special to look forward to. The big thing to watch for next year are the DVD releases of Dead or Alive and Nostradamus and any news if they will indeed be shown in theaters.

Happy Holidays! See you in 2004!
